author: Staff Reporter
text:
R. Ponni, Superintendent of Police, Tiruvannamalai, said the department has asked the authorities of Sri Arunachaleswarar Temple to install CCTV cameras on the ‘girivalam’ path.

“There are 32 cameras being operated inside the temple. We want the ‘girivalam’ path to be covered by CCTV cameras, and have asked temple authorities to take up required measures,” she said.

Apart from being engaged in traffic arrangements and bandobust, the police department will also set up “May I Help You” booths to guide devotees, she added.
title: CCTV coverage in ‘girivalam’ path
